text:
In complete agreement here. Ivanti bought out mobileiron/pulse secure just like
they bought out Shavlik Patch. You could blame the concept that ivanti milks the
products they buy and isn’t investing enough into development afterwards, but I
wouldn’t conflate python vulns that existed years before Ivanti bought out Pulse
with ISC, which is still likely a large amount Shavlik code, and feels unlikely
to share dev teams, except perhaps folks doing their agent UI which isn’t
related to the vpn appliance.

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] If not Ivanti, what?
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from 33matt@gmail.com. Learn why this is important
